name: crochet-gallery-fullstack
description: Full Stack E-Commerce Application for Crochet Gallery

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"

author: Antigravity
